verses.verse: In you, O LORD,<WH3068> do I put my trust:<WH2620> let me never<WH408> <WH5769> be put to confusion.<WH954>
Deliver<WH5337> me in your righteousness,<WH6666> and cause me to escape:<WH6403> incline<WH5186> your ear<WH241> to me, and save<WH3467> me.

Be you my strong<WH6697> habitation,<WH4583> whereunto I may continually<WH8548> resort:<WH935> you have given commandment<WH6680> to save<WH3467> me; for you are my rock<WH5553> and my fortress.<WH4686>
Deliver<WH6403> me, O my God,<WH430> out of the hand<WH3027> of the wicked,<WH7563> out of the hand<WH3709> of the unrighteous<WH5765> and cruel<WH2556> man.
For you are my hope,<WH8615> O Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> you are my trust<WH4009> from my youth.<WH5271>
By you have I been held<WH5564> up from the womb:<WH990> you are he that took<WH1491> me out of my mother's<WH517> bowels:<WH4578> my praise<WH8416> shall be continually<WH8548> of you.
I am as a wonder<WH4159> to many;<WH7227> but you are my strong<WH5797> refuge.<WH4268>
Let my mouth<WH6310> be filled<WH4390> with your praise<WH8416> and with your honor<WH8597> all<WH3605> the day.<WH3117>
Cast<WH7993> me not off in the time<WH6256> of old<WH2209> age; forsake<WH5800> me not when my strength<WH3581> fails.<WH3615>
For my enemies<WH341> speak<WH559> against me; and they that lay wait<WH8104> for my soul<WH5315> take counsel<WH3289> together,<WH3162>
Saying,<WH559> God<WH430> has forsaken<WH5800> him: persecute<WH7291> and take<WH8610> him; for there is none<WH369> to deliver<WH5337> him.
O God,<WH430> be not far<WH7368> from me: O my God,<WH430> make haste<WH2439> for my help.<WH5833>

Let them be confounded<WH954> and consumed<WH3615> that are adversaries<WH7853> to my soul;<WH5315> let them be covered<WH5844> with reproach<WH2781> and dishonor<WH3639> that seek<WH1245> my hurt.<WH7451>
But I will hope<WH3176> continually,<WH8548> and will yet praise<WH8416> you more<WH3254> and more.<WH3254>
My mouth<WH6310> shall show<WH5608> forth<WH3318> your righteousness<WH6666> and your salvation<WH8668> all<WH3605> the day;<WH3117> for I know<WH3045> not the numbers<WH5615> thereof.
I will go<WH935> in the strength<WH1369> of the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> I will make mention<WH2142> of your righteousness,<WH6666> even of your only.<WH905>
O God,<WH430> you have taught<WH3925> me from my youth:<WH5271> and till now<WH5704> <WH2008> have I declared<WH5046> your wondrous<WH6381> works.

Now also<WH1571> when<WH5704> I am old<WH2209> and gray headed,<WH7872> O God,<WH430> forsake<WH5800> me not; until<WH5704> I have showed<WH5046> your strength<WH2220> to this generation,<WH1755> and your power<WH1369> to every<WH3605> one that is to come.<WH935>
Your righteousness<WH6666> also, O God,<WH430> is very<WH5704> high,<WH4791> who<WH834> have done<WH6213> great<WH1419> things: O God,<WH430> who<WH4310> is like<WH3644> to you!

You, which<WH834> have showed<WH7200> me great<WH7229> and sore<WH7451> troubles,<WH6869> shall quicken<WH2421> me again,<WH7725> and shall bring<WH5927> me up again<WH7725> from the depths<WH8415> of the earth.<WH776>
You shall increase<WH7235> my greatness,<WH1420> and comfort<WH5162> me on every<WH5437> side.<WH5437>
I will also<WH1571> praise<WH3034> you with the psaltery,<WH3627> even your truth,<WH571> O my God:<WH430> to you will I sing<WH2167> with the harp,<WH3658> O you Holy<WH6918> One of Israel.<WH3478>
My lips<WH8193> shall greatly rejoice<WH7442> when<WH3588> I sing<WH2167> to you; and my soul,<WH5315> which<WH834> you have redeemed.<WH6299>

My tongue<WH3956> also<WH1571> shall talk<WH1897> of your righteousness<WH6666> all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> long: for they are confounded,<WH954> for they are brought<WH2659> to shame,<WH2659> that seek<WH1245> my hurt.<WH7451>
